trends: There have been 56 other sightings in Buffalo
There were no other sightings in Buffalo on or around October 10th 2013
Summary: driving home, saw objects, 3 lights in a triangle shape, did not move .drove under one.slightly metalic diffused light. very large.
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving home, 8 at night. Saw in the distance a group of lights in a triangle shap.. seemed odd. Continued driving, the lights got bigger, one of them was over the thruway and I drove under it. The light was very large with diffused light and slighly metalic. No definate outline. Lost sight when I went under a bridge. Still can't quite get my head around this.
